audioText: Cette terre vierge aux forêts épaisses représente un territoire intact où l'homme jaloux de la nature n'a pas encore imposé sa volonté raisonnable mais destructrice
question: What does this virgin land with thick forests represent?
options: An intact territory where jealous humans haven't imposed their reasonable but destructive will
A dangerous wilderness that needs immediate human intervention
A perfect example of sustainable human development
A protected area where rational planning has succeeded
explanation: The text states 'Cette terre vierge aux forêts épaisses représente un territoire intact où l'homme jaloux de la nature n'a pas encore imposé sa volonté raisonnable mais destructrice' - This virgin land with thick forests represents an intact territory where humans, jealous of nature, haven't yet imposed their reasonable but destructive will. This combines 'vierge', 'épaisses', 'jaloux', and 'raisonnable'.
